format: preprocessor include file (likely shell or makefile snippets with embedded variables and comments)
description: This file contains configuration definitions for Power6 architecture tuning, including compiler flags, package architecture info, feature flags, and additional build configuration options specific to powerpc Power6 processors within a Yocto/OpenEmbedded build environment.

methods.name: bb.utils.contains
methods.description: Utility method used within the configuration for checking conditional expressions based on build variables.
